test_vectors.name: chain_reward_empty_block
test_vectors.description: Import one empty block; miner gets block_reward minus dev fee (10% at height 1).

test_vectors.name: chain_reward_two_empty_blocks
test_vectors.description: Import two empty blocks; miner rewards accumulate (dev fee 10% at these heights).

test_vectors.name: chain_explicit_height_two_blocks
test_vectors.description: Import two empty blocks with explicit height fields (1 then 2).

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_reachability_ancestor_parent
test_vectors.description: Reject a block that references parents where one is an ancestor of the other.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_timestamp_too_old
test_vectors.description: Reject a block with timestamp_ms less than its parent timestamp.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_timestamp_too_new
test_vectors.description: Reject a block with timestamp_ms far in the future.

test_vectors.name: chain_fork_then_merge_rewards
test_vectors.description: Import a fork (b2 and b3) then a merge (b4 with two parents); miner reward accumulates for all imported blocks.

test_vectors.name: chain_two_side_blocks_same_height_rewards
test_vectors.description: Import b2/b3/b4 all at height 2 from b1 then merge with b5; side blocks receive reduced rewards (30% then 15%).

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_tips_count_zero
test_vectors.description: Reject a non-genesis block with zero parents/tips.

test_vectors.name: chain_three_side_blocks_same_height_rewards
test_vectors.description: Import b2/b3/b4/b6 at height 2 then merge; side blocks receive 30%, 15%, then 7% rewards.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_tip_not_found
test_vectors.description: Reject a block referencing a missing parent hash.

test_vectors.name: chain_non_tip_parent_allowed
test_vectors.description: Import a block that references a non-tip parent (fork from an earlier block).

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_block_height
test_vectors.description: Reject a block whose declared height does not match its parents.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_tips_count_over_limit
test_vectors.description: Reject a block with >3 tips (parents).

test_vectors.name: chain_fork_longer_branch_then_merge_rewards
test_vectors.description: Import a fork that grows longer before merge; miner rewards accrue for each block including side block b3.

test_vectors.name: chain_blocks_with_txs_success
test_vectors.description: Import two blocks containing transfers; tx effects and miner rewards are reflected in post-state.

test_vectors.name: chain_four_side_blocks_same_height_rewards
test_vectors.description: Import five blocks at height 2; side blocks receive 30%, 15%, 7%, then 5% rewards.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_reject_atomic_on_second_tx
test_vectors.description: Import a block with two txs where the second has nonce too high; entire block is rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_blocks_with_txs_invalid_second_block
test_vectors.description: Import one valid tx block then reject second block with nonce-too-high tx; state reflects only block1.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_burn_then_tx_insufficient_balance_rejected
test_vectors.description: Burn then transfer in the same block; transfer fails, so block is rejected and burn is rolled back.

test_vectors.name: chain_merge_before_parent_invalid_order
test_vectors.description: Merge references b2 before b2 is imported; should be INVALID_TIPS_NOT_FOUND.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_reachability_three_tips
test_vectors.description: Reject a block whose tips include an ancestor (b1) and its descendant (b2).

test_vectors.name: chain_burn_accumulates_across_blocks
test_vectors.description: Import two blocks with burn txs; total_burned accumulates while miner rewards apply.

test_vectors.name: chain_side_block_rewards_then_burn
test_vectors.description: Import fork with a side block, then a burn tx; rewards + total_burned reflect all.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_reachability_four_tips
test_vectors.description: Reject a block whose tips include ancestors (b1/b2) and descendant (b3).

test_vectors.name: chain_merge_order_variation_same_result
test_vectors.description: Import same fork/merge DAG but provide b3 before b2; merge still succeeds.

test_vectors.name: chain_three_tips_allowed
test_vectors.description: Import three tips at the same height (limit is 3); should succeed.

test_vectors.name: chain_tips_count_over_limit_after_merge
test_vectors.description: Reject a block with 4 tips (limit is 3) after multiple branches.

test_vectors.name: chain_cross_block_receive_then_spend
test_vectors.description: Receive in block 1, spend in block 2; balances and nonces update correctly.

test_vectors.name: chain_cross_branch_receive_then_spend_after_merge
test_vectors.description: Receive on branch block, then spend after merge; balances should reflect both.

test_vectors.name: chain_merge_three_parents_unordered
test_vectors.description: Merge with three parents in unsorted order; should still import successfully.

test_vectors.name: chain_randomized_order_same_dag
test_vectors.description: Blocks are provided in a shuffled but dependency-valid order; should still succeed.

test_vectors.name: chain_multi_block_burn_then_transfer
test_vectors.description: Burn in block 1 then transfer in block 2; total_burned and balances reflect both.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_merge_height
test_vectors.description: Reject a merge block whose declared height is lower than expected for its tips.

test_vectors.name: chain_invalid_tip_not_found_after_fork
test_vectors.description: Reject a block that references a missing parent hash after a fork is present.

test_vectors.name: chain_randomized_order_with_side_blocks_same_result
test_vectors.description: Provide a shuffled DAG with two side blocks and a merge; final state should match.

test_vectors.name: chain_randomized_order_with_txs_same_result
test_vectors.description: Forked DAG with txs on each branch, shuffled order; merge should apply both txs.

test_vectors.name: chain_multi_block_burn_transfer_mix
test_vectors.description: Burn, transfer, then burn across three blocks; total_burned and balances reflect all ops.

test_vectors.name: chain_random_order_two_merges_variant_a
test_vectors.description: Two merges with side blocks; ordering A should still result in the same final state.

test_vectors.name: chain_random_order_two_merges_variant_b
test_vectors.description: Two merges with side blocks; ordering B should still result in the same final state.

test_vectors.name: chain_multi_block_burn_transfer_mix_extended
test_vectors.description: Burn/transfer/empty/burn/transfer across five blocks; totals accumulate with rewards.

test_vectors.name: chain_rewards_burn_across_blocks_with_merge
test_vectors.description: Main and side branches both burn, then merge; rewards and total_burned accumulate.

test_vectors.name: chain_random_order_complex_dag_stable
test_vectors.description: Deeper DAG with two merges in shuffled order should converge to the same state.

test_vectors.name: chain_multi_branch_txs_merge
test_vectors.description: Two branches include transfers; after merge both effects should be reflected.

test_vectors.name: chain_tips_over_limit_with_reachability_noise
test_vectors.description: Reject a block with 4 tips where one tip is also non-reachable.

test_vectors.name: chain_cross_block_dependency_after_merge
test_vectors.description: Receive on one branch, merge, then spend on the merged chain.

test_vectors.name: chain_mixed_empty_tx_burn
test_vectors.description: Empty blocks interleaved with burn and transfer blocks; totals accumulate with rewards.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_invalid_signature_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a transfer that has an invalid signature; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_insufficient_fee_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a fee-too-low transfer; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_account_not_found_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block whose sender does not exist; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_nonce_too_low_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a transfer whose nonce is below expected; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_nonce_too_high_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a transfer whose nonce is above expected; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_insufficient_balance_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block where sender lacks funds for amount+fee; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_receiver_overflow_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block where receiver balance would overflow; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_chain_id_mismatch_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a tx for the wrong chain_id; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_transfer_zero_amount_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a zero-amount transfer; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_burn_zero_amount_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a zero-amount burn; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_burn_exceeds_balance_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with a burn exceeding balance+fee; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_txs_duplicate_nonce_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with duplicate nonce from same sender; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_multisig_invalid_threshold_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with invalid multisig threshold; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_agent_account_invalid_controller_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with agent_account register using zero controller; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.description: Import a block with energy delegation to self; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.description: Import a block with deploy_contract empty module; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_contract_invoke_missing_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with invoke_contract for missing contract; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.description: Import a block with shield transfers empty list; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.description: Import a block with unshield transfers empty list; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_register_name_too_short_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with too-short name registration; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_transfer_energy_fee_rejected
test_vectors.description: Import a block with transfers using Energy fee type; block should be rejected.

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_energy_fee_nonce_high_prioritizes_fee_error

test_vectors.name: chain_block_with_multisig_fee_zero_prioritizes_min_fee
